thread.title: Catherine Shoemaker
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Catherine Shoemaker

author: Catherine Shoemaker
title: Catherine Shoemaker
text: It cost me $40.00 for them to haul the old sofa in order to have room for the new sofa. They shattered my decorative glass storm door. However, I love the new sofa. Now I have to wait for Gardner White to call me about my storm door.
